label: [Lighting] GR
info:
This flow controls all things related to lighting in the Great Room:
 - Motion sensor based lighting
 - Illuminance sensor control with thresholding to allow on and force off
 - Physical switch control references the same mode profile (off delay and brightness)
 - Motion Detection control
 - TV lighting control
 - Change in Motion Detection results in a change in light only if occupied

label: [Lighting] KT
info:
This flow controls all things related to lighting in the Kitchen:
 - Motion sensor based lighting
 - Special lighting toggle for color lighting of undercabinet LED strips (New Years, Valentine's Day, St. Patrick's Day, Easter, 4th of July, Halloween, Thanksgiving, and Christmas)
 - Physical switch control references the same mode profile (off delay and brightness)
 - Motion Detection control
 - Change in Motion Detection results in a change in light only if occupied

label: [Lighting] DB
info:
This flow controls all things related to lighting in the Downstairs Bedroom:
 - Motion sensor based lighting
 - Contact sensor to automatically control motion sensing based on perceived occupance
 - Physical switch control references the same mode profile (off delay and brightness)
 - Motion Detection control
 - Contact Detection control
 - Change in Motion Detection results in a change in light only if occupied

label: [Lighting] MB
info:
This flow controls all things related to lighting in the Downstairs Bedroom:
 - Motion sensor based lighting
 - Contact sensor to automatically control motion sensing based on perceived occupance
 - Special night mode lighting for extra dim nightlight effect of floor lamp
 - Physical dimmer remote control references the same mode profile (off delay and brightness)
 - Motion Detection control
 - Contact Detection control
 - Change in Motion Detection results in a change in light only if occupied

label: [Alexa] Voice Commands
info:
Per room commands:
 -  Lights
 -  Heating/Cooling
 -  Motion Detection
 -  Contact Detection (MB and DB only)
 -  Do Not Disturb
 -  Reading Mode

name: Alexa Device Handler
info: This subflow takes a Alexa Device Activity payload and checks which Echo device it came from and directs the message accordingly.

name: Mode Variables
info: This stores the data associated with each mode, each mode which contains data associated with each room.

name: Get Echo Serials
info: This subflow gets the serial numbers and names for all echo devices

name: Room Variables
info: This stores the default variables and data associated with each room

name: HE Light Arguments
